Event.name: Political_actions
Event.definition: <def-root>A less-powerful person or group of people (the <fen>Activists</fen>) engages in an activity aimed to inconvenience or weaken a more powerful person or group (the <fen>Institution</fen>) to seek redress, in the form of a series of <fen>Demands</fen>, for the wrondgoings committed by the Instituion. <ex><fex name="Activists"> The workers</fex> were <t>striking</t> <fex name="Demands">for better wages and better benefits</fex>.</ex> <ex>The <t>strike</t> against <fex name="Institution">the corporation</fex> <fex name="Duration">lasted for 6 weeks</fex>. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Activists
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person or group of people that act out against the <fen>Institution</fen> in an attempt to have their <fen>Demands</fen> fullfilled. </def-root>

Arg.name: Institution
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Institution</fen> is the company, factory, political party / institution, or entity that yields authority over the <fen>Activists</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Demands
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Demands</fen> are the guarantee(s) given by the <fen>Institution</fen> to the <fen>Activists</fen> that act to correct or address the issues or state of affairs that were grievous to the <fen>Activists</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Duration</fen> is the length of time that the political action takes to be resolved. </def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the political action is carried out. </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Activists</fen> carry out the political action. </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> is the location where the political action occurs. </def-root>

Arg.name: Type
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE is the subtype of the general category of action taken by the <fen>Activists</fen> against the <fen>Institution</fen>.
<ex>The <fex name="Type">hunger</fex> <t>strike</t> lasted for three weeks.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Result
Arg.definition: <def-root>The result of the event in which the <fen>Activists</fen> act against the <fen>Institution</fen>. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: strike.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: (of a less powerful group) to carry out an activity intended to change the actions or policies of a more powerful group or organization, usually involving disruption of the normal funtions of the more powerful group

lexUnit.name: strike.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: an activity carried out by a less powerful group intended to change the actions or policies of a more powerful group or organization, usually involving disruption of the normal functions of the more powerful group

lexUnit.name: walk-out.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a strike action in which workers or students abruptly leave their normal posts. (See Political_actions.strike.n)
